solution_line_template: Scoring {michael_multiplier} times more than Bruce, Michael scored {bruce_goals} * {michael_multiplier} = <<{bruce_goals}*{michael_multiplier}={michael_goals}>>{michael_goals} goals.
Both, Bruce and Michael scored {michael_goals} + {bruce_goals} =<<{michael_goals}+{bruce_goals}={total_goals}>>{total_goals} goals.
